screen time is elapsed time from beginning of visit in min:sec

u.a: M puts chair next to her by table; C stands on other side near house
M seems to be touching a toy
M holds something out for C to see
M pats chair she placed next to herself
C holds cowboy and cup together; gives drink
C plays with car; makes car noises
C kneels on floor in front of table; is at eye level with toys he manipulates
M laughs at C's play; hands pitcher to C
M pours from pitcher in cup
M takes pitcher and sets it down .
C stops pouring and runs hands over teapot
M points in book C holds
M takes book from C turns to cover
M points to a cover picture
M points to another cover picture
M waits for C to finish her sentence; no immediate response from C
M waits for C to finish her sentence; no immediate response from C
C starts to turn page; M stops him
M moves book a little away from C
M tries to turn page; C stops her; M lets go of book
C holds arms up and does a little jump in his chair; M laughs; M turns page
C demonstrates finger in own mouth
